attributes.action: Support parents buy paying them the "approved childcare" part of "Working Tax Credit" to stay at home and look after their own children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"The Working Tax Credit includes a specific element to support the cost of registered or approved childcare for working parents. The childcare element can help with up to 80 per cent of your eligible childcare costs."

Surely we would create a more stable and happy environment for our children to grow up if they were able to stay at home and either parent didn't have to go out to work.

Give parents this allowance so that one of them can stay at home and look after their own children.
